articles.author: Times Now Digital
articles.title: Gone For Rs 61.8 Crore! Indian Artist's Painting Sold For Record-Breaking Price - Times Now
articles.description: The oil on canvas painting broke the previous record held by Syed Haider Raza’s painting titled ‘Gestation’. Raza’s painting was sold for Rs 51.7 crore at the Pundole auction house earlier this month.
articles.content: The painting was sold in a Saffronart sale at The Oberoi, New Delhi. Notably, Sher-Gil died at the age of 24 in 1941.
